Package controller

Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
controller.AlbumController
public class AlbumController
extends java.lang.Object
this class controls the albums view, where we can see all the albums a user has. the albumsView is called albums.fxml here we can create new albums, and search for photos.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AlbumController.AlbumListCell
    this inner class allows for the listView in albums to be populated with custom listcells
